mapper.sql: ID, REMARK, REVIEW_STATUS, C_TIME, U_TIME, C_USER, U_USER, STATUS, VERSION, AGENT_ID, PLATFORM_TYPE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from O_TERMINAL_TRANSFER
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into O_TERMINAL_TRANSFER (ID, REMARK, REVIEW_STATUS, C_TIME, U_TIME, C_USER, U_USER, STATUS, VERSION, AGENT_ID, PLATFORM_TYPE) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{uTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platformType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into O_TERMINAL_TRANSFER
ID,
REMARK,
REVIEW_STATUS,
C_TIME,
U_TIME,
C_USER,
U_USER,
STATUS,
VERSION,
AGENT_ID,
PLATFORM_TYPE,

mapper.update:
update O_TERMINAL_TRANSFER
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REVIEW_STATUS = #{reviewStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
C_TIME = #{cTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
U_TIME = #{uTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
C_USER = #{cUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
U_USER = #{uUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AGENT_ID = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLATFORM_TYPE = #{platformType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update O_TERMINAL_TRANSFER set REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REVIEW_STATUS = #{reviewStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, C_TIME = #{cTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, U_TIME = #{uTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, C_USER = #{cUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, U_USER = #{uUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AGENT_ID = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLATFORM_TYPE = #{platformType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

sql.if: select * from ( select row_.*, rownum rownum_ from (

mapper.select: select activ_id from a_bus_act_rel where bus_id in ( select t.id from o_terminal_transfer t where id in ( select bus_id from a_approval_flow_record where bus_id like 'TT%' and approval_dep ='221' and approval_result ='pass' ) and t.review_status !='3' )

select * from a_agent_businfo
bus_num = #{busNum} and STATUS=1 and ROWNUM = 1 and BUS_STATUS in('1','2')

select aaa.SN_BEGIN_NUM,aaa.SN_END_NUM,aaa.ID from O_TERMINAL_TRANSFER_DETAIL aaa left join A_AGENT bbb on aaa.AGENT_ID = bbb.id where aaa.TERMINAL_TRANSFER_ID in( select ID from O_TERMINAL_TRANSFER where REVIEW_STATUS ='02' and STATUS ='1') and aaa.STATUS ='1' and aaa.adjust_status = '1' and bbb.STATUS='1' and aaa.SN_BEGIN_NUM like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{common}),'%')

select distinct nvl(BUS_NUM, '-') BUS_NUM from A_AGENT_BUSINFO start with AGENT_ID = (select AGENT_ID from ( SELECT AGENT_ID,ROWNUM as num from (select AGENT_ID from A_AGENT_BUSINFO start with AGENT_ID = #{AGENT_ID} CONNECT BY PRIOR BUS_PARENT = id )) where num = (select COUNT(*) from A_AGENT_BUSINFO start with AGENT_ID = #{AGENT_ID} CONNECT BY PRIOR BUS_PARENT= id)) CONNECT BY PRIOR ID = BUS_PARENT
select * from ( select * from A_AGENT_BUSINFO a start with a.bus_num=#{bus_num} CONNECT BY PRIOR BUS_PARENT = ID ) where Bus_PARENT is null
select * from A_AGENT_BUSINFO a start with a.bus_num=#{bus_num} and a.status ='1'and a.bus_status='1' CONNECT BY PRIOR BUS_PARENT = ID
select * from A_AGENT_BUSINFO a where a.bus_num=#{bus_num}
select * from A_PLATFORM a where a.PLATFORM_NUM=#{PLATFORM_NUM}
select AGENT_ID,BUS_TYPE,BUS_NUM,BUS_PLATFORM from A_AGENT_BUSINFO where POS_PLAT_CODE = #{POS_PLAT_CODE} and STATUS=1 and BUS_STATUS in('1','2')
